Content.Text:
<FACE_JONAS><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Hello. Are you the new farmer in town?
<PAGE>
I'm Jonas. I'm working as a receptionist at the
Trade Depot. Nice to meet you.

<FACE_JONAS><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LAUGH>
Good morning. How's your work going?

<FACE_JONAS><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Good evening, <MYNAME>. *yawn* I think I
might go home and turn in early tonight.

<FACE_JONAS><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Bah, rainy days are so gloomy, aren't they?

<FACE_JONAS><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Guess we're in for another scorcher today.

<FACE_JONAS><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
This rain's going to make things really humid
today.

<FACE_JONAS><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LAUGH>
I love these nice, crisp autumn days, don't you?

<FACE_JONAS><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Autumn rains get a little chilly, don't they?

<FACE_JONAS><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LAUGH>
It's a little cold out, but I like how sunny it is
today.

<FACE_JONAS><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Careful not to slip and fall in all this snow.

<FACE_JONAS><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
You sure you ought to be working on a day like
this? It's not safe, you know. You should get
home soon.

<FACE_JONAS><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
You ought to get home soon. You don't want to
get stranded here in the snow.

<FACE_JONAS><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LAUGH>
My wife tells me you've been seeing someone
lately. Is that so?
<PAGE>
...That's sweet. Takes me back to my younger
days.

<FACE_JONAS><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Sometimes on Sundays, I'll chat with my friends
around here.

<FACE_JONAS><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
I need to be more careful when I walk outside.
I've been tripping a lot lately... Guess these legs
aren't what they used to be.

<FACE_JONAS><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
I'd like to take a walk in the forest sometime.

<FACE_JONAS><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
How's your work? All that labor's got to be hard
on you, but in a way, it looks kind of exciting.
<PAGE>
Me, I just do the same thing every day. I mean,
it's my job, so I can't complain too much, but...

<FACE_JONAS><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Are there any insects on your farm?
<PAGE>
I like insects... I've always wanted to keep them
and study them, but my wife can't stand the
sight of them, unfortunately.
<PAGE>
So since I'm not allowed to keep them, I have a
picture book full of them instead, and I peek at
that when she's not looking.

<FACE_JONAS><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Not that I know anything about running a farm,
but I do know that when you ship products, it's
best not to ship too much of the same thing.
<PAGE>
Supply and demand, you know. Too much of
the same product on the market at the same
time will drop the price, guaranteed.

<FACE_JONAS><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
I didn't get to play outside a lot when I was a
child, so I'd like my son to enjoy the rivers and
the mountains as much as he can.
<PAGE>
Seems my son likes animals. He's always up in
the mountains looking for rabbits and foxes.
<PAGE>
It's important to study, but children should learn
to enjoy and appreciate the outdoors too,
shouldn't they?

<FACE_JONAS><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Work keeps me busy, so I don't get to spend
much time at home.
<PAGE>
When I do get a day off, I spend as much of it
as possible with my family. Mostly, we just go
for walks together.
<PAGE>
It's not a family duty or anything like that. I just
want to spend time with them, and they're kind
enough to humor me.

<FACE_JONAS><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
I've been helping the guild for a long time, but
I've always had a dream to study insects.
<PAGE>
When I was small, I couldn't go outdoors much,
so I watched the flowers and insects in my
home garden. That's what got me started.
<PAGE>
But you can imagine how hard it is to make a
career out of studying bugs. And if you've got a
family to support, it's just about impossible.
<PAGE>
Still, I like insects, and since we're so close to
the mountains, there's a lot of them around here.
So I get to observe them sometimes.

<FACE_JONAS><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
You're always working hard, <MYNAME>. I can
tell since I'm always at the Trade Depot.
<PAGE>
I appreciate it when you take time out of your
day to talk to me.
<PAGE>
My son seems to like you as well. So we'll
always look forward to seeing you here.

<FACE_JONAS><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LAUGH>
Wow, is this <BLUE><ITEMNAME0></BLUE> for me?
Oh, this is my favorite. Thank you very much.

<FACE_JONAS><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LAUGH>
Oh, I really like this. Thank you very much.

<FACE_JONAS><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LAUGH>
Ah, I like this. Thank you very much.

<FACE_JONAS><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LAUGH>
I won't say no to a present. Good stuff. Thanks.

<FACE_JONAS><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ANGRY>
Is this for me...? Well, okay, I'll take it.

<FACE_JONAS><POS_RIGHT><FACE_SAD>
Hmm, I don't usually care for these...
<PAGE>
<FACE_ANGRY>W-well, since it's a present from you, sure, I'll
accept it.

<FACE_JONAS><POS_RIGHT><FACE_SAD>
I...hate <BLUE><ITEMNAME0></BLUE> more than
anything...
<PAGE>
<FACE_ANGRY>O-okay, fine... I'll take it.

<FACE_JONAS><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
This looks fantastic. Thank you very much.
Let's not give him a present right now.

<FACE_JONAS><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
You know, you don't have to be this nice,
especially since we haven't talked in a while.
Save it for next time, please.

<FACE_JONAS><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
You know, I'd feel bad getting this many
presents from you in one day. Why don't you put
that away for now and save it for next time?

<FACE_JONAS><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LAUGH>
Wow, <BLUE><ITEMNAME0></BLUE> just for me. My
very favorite. Oh? It's a birthday present?
<PAGE>
You're a thoughtful person. Thank you very
much.

<FACE_JONAS><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LAUGH>
Wow, just for me, huh? I love it. Oh? It's a
birthday present?
<PAGE>
It is my birthday, isn't it? I'd forgotten. Thanks
so much.

<FACE_JONAS><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LAUGH>
Ah, just what I like.
<PAGE>
Oh, it's a birthday present, huh? Thank you very
much.

<FACE_JONAS><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LAUGH>
Is this a birthday present for me? Thanks! That's
very thoughtful of you.

<FACE_JONAS><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
What? Is this for me...? Oh, it's a birthday
present... Well, I'll take it.

<FACE_JONAS><POS_RIGHT><FACE_SAD>
You're really giving me this? I don't care much
for these, usually...
<PAGE>
...Is this a birthday present? W-well, in that
case, I'll take it.

<FACE_JONAS><POS_RIGHT><FACE_SAD>
I hate <BLUE><ITEMNAME0></BLUE> more than
anything...
<PAGE>
What? It's a birthday present...? O-okay, I, um...I
guess I'll take it.

<FACE_JONAS><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LAUGH>
This looks fantastic. It's a birthday present?
Thank you very much.

<FACE_JONAS><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Careful that thing doesn't trick you.

<FACE_JONAS><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
That looks cute... Now that I look up close, it's
got a really funny face.

<FACE_JONAS><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LAUGH>
Never looked at one of these up close before.
Cute, isn't it?

<FACE_JONAS><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Never seen this kind of rabbit before. Oh, its fur
is worth HOW much?

<FACE_JONAS><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LAUGH>
This thing is actually pretty cute.

<FACE_JONAS><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LAUGH>
Oh, what a cute dog. I wish I could keep one,
too...

<FACE_JONAS><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
You fed the dog too much. Look, it got fat.

<FACE_JONAS><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LAUGH>
Oh, this is a good dog. I wish I could keep one,
too...

<FACE_JONAS><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
You fed the dog too much. Look, it got fat.

<FACE_JONAS><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ANGRY>
I don't really like cats...and you fed it so much,
it's like a round little cat-ball now.

<FACE_JONAS><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ANGRY>
I don't really like cats...and you fed it so much,
it's like a round little cat-ball now.

<FACE_JONAS><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Oh, look at this flower. So pretty. What? For
me...? Oh, it's a present for the Flower Fair, isn't
it? Thank you.

<FACE_JONAS><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Is that a blue feather? When I was young... Oh,
never mind.

<FACE_JONAS><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
A ring...? I'm afraid you're giving it to the wrong
person.

<FACE_JONAS><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Oh, it's all tied up with a ribbon. I like the color.
Can I see what's inside...?

<FACE_JONAS><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Oh, is that a present for me? Hmm, I wonder
what's inside...

<FACE_JONAS><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Happy birthday! I brought you a present. I hope
you'll like it.

<FACE_JONAS><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Today's your birthday, right? Happy birthday.

<FACE_JONAS><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
I haven't seen you for a while. How have you
been?
<PAGE>
I hear you've been coming to the Trade Depot a
lot, so stop by and talk to me anytime.

<FACE_JONAS><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
That's a nice jacket. Purple is my favorite color.

<FACE_JONAS><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
I like the design of your outfit. It looks practical
and comfortable to walk in.

<FACE_JONAS><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
That's the perfect outfit for gardening, isn't it? I
like the purple jacket, too.

<FACE_JONAS><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
I've never seen anyone wear something like that
before. But I like the purple color.

<FACE_JONAS><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
That's a nice coat. I want one just like it.

<FACE_JONAS><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
That outfit's really stylish. The purple tie goes
well with the jacket.

<FACE_JONAS><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
That's a beautiful dress. I like the coloring.

<FACE_JONAS><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
I like that outfit. The coloring is very chic.

<FACE_JONAS><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Cute clothes you've got on. I like those purple
shorts.

<FACE_JONAS><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
You're dressed up all cute today. The skirt looks
good on you.

<FACE_JONAS><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
You're dressed very beautifully, if you don't mind
me saying so. I like the black and purple
coloring.

<FACE_JONAS><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
I've never seen a doctor in black. It's not such a
bad look, though.

<FACE_JONAS><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
That's an outfit nuns wear, right? Makes a good
fashion statement, too. It's cute.

<FACE_JONAS><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Oh, are you going to work as a maid? ...I
wouldn't dress like that for farm work, let me tell
you.

<FACE_JONAS><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Oh, you look pretty good in that costume.
But...it's not meant for farm work.

<FACE_JONAS><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Oh, is there a festival today?

<FACE_JONAS><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Oh, is there a festival today?

<FACE_JONAS><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Oh, is there a festival today?

<FACE_JONAS><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Oh, is there a festival today?

<FACE_JONAS><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Oh, is there a festival today?

<FACE_JONAS><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
That's a nice hat. It's perfect for a farmer.

<FACE_JONAS><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
That's my kind of hat you've got on.

<FACE_JONAS><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
That's a strange hat. Is it a kind of umbrella?
Good to wear on a sunny day, I suppose.

<FACE_JONAS><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
That purple hat is so pretty. I guess it's more like
an accessory than a hat, right?

<FACE_JONAS><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Nothing says "farmer" like a cowboy hat, right? It
looks good on you.

<FACE_JONAS><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Is that a witch's hat? I bet the kids love it.

<FACE_JONAS><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
That's a flashy hat. Are you going someplace
nice today?

<FACE_JONAS><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Oh, what are you listening to with those
headphones? ...You're just wearing them to wear
them? Oh, I see.

<FACE_JONAS><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
I like black-framed glasses. They're so simple
they go along with everything.

<FACE_JONAS><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Those sunglasses look good on you. I can't wear
them anymore. My wife said they make me look
too scary.

<FACE_JONAS><POS_RIGHT><FACE_PATI>
...Sure... That's perfectly clear... N-no... I didn't
say anything... Zzz...

<FACE_JONAS><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Pardon me, but it's getting very late. Shouldn't
you be on your way home?

<FACE_JONAS><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
I'm sorry. I'm eating right now, so could you
wait a little while?

<FACE_JONAS><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
I got sick easily when I was a kid. This here
reminds me of all the things I couldn't play with.

<FACE_JONAS><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
In spring, you can see all kinds of worms
crawling up the cherry blossom trees.

<FACE_JONAS><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Whenever I see anything purple, I feel relaxed. It's
my favorite color.

<FACE_JONAS><POS_RIGHT><FACE_SAD>
When I tell people I like silver, they always say it
doesn't fit my image... What kind of image do
they think I have?

<FACE_JONAS><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LAUGH>
This place seems very cold. You made this place
look colder, just with visuals? You're a genius,
<MYNAME>.

<FACE_JONAS><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LAUGH>
Did you arrange all this? I can feel the heat in
this place. You're amazing at this.

<FACE_JONAS><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
This view of a snowy land... It reminds me of a
place where my wife and I traveled once.

<FACE_JONAS><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Hmm, this is interesting. I should show this to
my kid, too.

<FACE_JONAS><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
You can see Asche at the Silk Country store.
She's a very passionate merchant. You can buy
just about all the basics from her.

<FACE_JONAS><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Marielle is the one who runs the Cabin Country
store. You can buy any color of yarn from her.

<FACE_JONAS><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
In the Sakura Country store, you can buy
Yoshino's favorite rice. And he sells pearls, too.

<FACE_JONAS><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Kenneth, over at the Wheat Country store, sells
different kinds of seeds.

<FACE_JONAS><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Ennio from Rose Country is a snappy dresser,
isn't he?
<PAGE>
There's a lot of flower seeds and wine at his
store.

<FACE_JONAS><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Tropical Country's best products are fruit seeds
and really stylish sunglasses.

<FACE_JONAS><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Katrina, over at the Ice Country store, can sell
you Elli Leaves and rare minerals. And ice.

<FACE_JONAS><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
I hear you've been acquiring more fields. You
can handle them all. I believe in you.

<FACE_JONAS><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
You're the biggest farmer in this town. But it
must be tough to manage so many fields by
yourself.

<FACE_JONAS><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
I heard someone new moved into town. Always
good to see the town get busier.

<FACE_JONAS><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LAUGH>
This town's gotten really famous. People at the
Trade Depot keep wanting to know more about
it.

<FACE_JONAS><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LAUGH>
These days, lots of people come to visit the
town based off of rumors they've heard. The
town's getting famous, isn't it?

<FACE_JONAS><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
You know, working in the Trade Depot can get
pretty darn boring. I wish we had more stores
around here...

<FACE_JONAS><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Seems like ever since you moved here, more and
more people have been coming to visit.

<FACE_JONAS><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LAUGH>
This town is still small, but our Guild Master's
working hard every day to help it grow. We'll hit
the big time someday!

<FACE_JONAS><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
You and the other farmers worked so hard to
help this town prosper and grow. I really
appreciate that.

<FACE_JONAS><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
That's a beautiful bench. Purple is my favorite
color.

<FACE_JONAS><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
A silver bench looks nice, and it's not too flashy.

<FACE_JONAS><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
I want bricks like that so I can fix my house.

<FACE_JONAS><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
I want that kind of stone paving in my garden,
too.

<FACE_JONAS><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
I want that kind of stone paving in my garden,
too.

<FACE_JONAS><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
I like wooden columns. They have this sort of
natural warmth to them.

<FACE_JONAS><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
I wish I could sit on a beach chair like that and
spend the day relaxing...

<FACE_JONAS><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
I've never been to the beach, but it must feel so
nice to just prop up a beach parasol and lay
yourself down.

<FACE_JONAS><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
I wonder what that sign is for.

<FACE_JONAS><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
I don't know what this is for, but it looks like
there's a story behind this statue.

<FACE_JONAS><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
I don't know what this is for, but it looks like
there's a story behind this statue.

<FACE_JONAS><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Hmm, a faucet. Does it work? Does water come
out of it?

<FACE_JONAS><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
I wonder what a bridge like this is doing here.

<FACE_JONAS><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Oh, there's a mine cart here. I guess it's only for
decoration now.

<FACE_JONAS><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Sometimes, I feel like being a kid again and just
hopping on a swing like that one.

<FACE_JONAS><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
I didn't know this town had a fire extinguisher
handy. Good to know.

<FACE_JONAS><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
It's a tiny little castle, but it looks well-made.

<FACE_JONAS><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
...An anchor, huh? Makes me want to see the
ocean. I never have, you know. I'd like to
someday.

<FACE_JONAS><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Hydrangeas are so beautiful, aren't they?
Especially purple ones.

<FACE_JONAS><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
I like pink carnations. They're pretty.

<FACE_JONAS><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Hydrangeas are so beautiful, aren't they?
Especially purple ones.

<FACE_JONAS><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
I like pink carnations. They're pretty.

<FACE_JONAS><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
In spring, you can see all kinds of worms
crawling up the cherry blossom trees.

<FACE_JONAS><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
It's beautiful when maidenhair trees' leaves turn
yellow, isn't it?

<FACE_JONAS><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
That flower basket is beautiful, isn't it?

<FACE_JONAS><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
When it comes to topiaries, I like 'em round.
They look softer that way.

<FACE_JONAS><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Since pine trees are evergreen, they look
beautiful even in winter.

<FACE_JONAS><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
It's beautiful when maidenhair trees' leaves turn
yellow, isn't it?
